alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:35PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hamilton County through 315 PM EDT... At 234 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lakesite, or 7 miles north of Chattanooga, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Soddy-Daisy, Walden, Lakesite, Ridgeside, Harrison, Fairmount, Red Bank, Harrison Bay State Park and Middle Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
